com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events

Class SsmUpgradePackagesEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.SsmPackageEvent
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.SsmUpgradePackagesEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDatabaseMessage, EventMessage

    public class SsmUpgradePackagesEvent
extends SsmPackageEvent
    Event fired to carry the information necessary to upgrade packages on servers in the SSM.
    See Also:
    SsmUpgradePackagesAction

        public SsmUpgradePackagesEvent(java.lang.Long userIdIn,

                       ActionChain actionChainIn,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>>> sysPackageSetIn)
        Creates a new SSM upgrade packages event.
        Parameters:
        userIdIn - ID of user scheduling this action.
        earliestIn - Earliest data action can be picked up.
        actionChainIn - the selected Action Chain or null
        sysPackageSetIn - Complex map of: system id-> List Map name_id -> long evr_id -> long arch_id -> long
